ComicInfo.Summary:
In order to survive an all-out attack from a group of supernatural hunters, Becky Montcrief finds herself fighting side-by-side with the most unexpected of allies - the four horsemen of General Oliander Bedford Hume! Meanwhile Gord, Kirby, and Asher wage war against demonic skinwalkers and the inhuman minions of Missy Hume.
